name: Puzzle & Heroes
description:
Puzzle & Heroes is a fresh and exciting combination of card game and puzzle game!
Enter the world of mythology and collect epic heroes to build your team. Your mission is to stop the chaos and defeat the evils in your way!

STORY:
A horrible nightmare has become reality! Thor and Athena have appeared together, and two Venuses fought against each other... all because a the time-space error. The mythical world is in total chaos! Only fixing the system can get everything back to normal.

Monsters in your path? Just defeat them with your weapons! There are many heroes waiting to help you! A breathtaking journey is about to begin, start right now!

FEATURES:

* INNOVATIVE NEW MATCHING PUZZLE - Free style line matching: easy to play, hard to master. Approachable puzzle gameplay taken to the next level!
* THE BEST OF THREE WORLDS - Line matching puzzle adventure game with RPG-like character development, full of strategy!
* COLLECT & LEVEL UP - Collect all heroes and discover their special powers!
* STRATEGY & TACTICS - Use different teams to handle different puzzles and reach master level!
* STAY UPDATED - More quests, more characters and lots of surprises are on the way!


PLEASE NOTE! Puzzle & Heroes is completely free to download and play but some game items can be purchased with real money. To disable this feature, turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

* Requires iOS version 7.0

Like Puzzle & Heroes on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PuzzleAndHeroes/

THANK YOU!
